item.title: Python in Sublime Text 3 with Sublime REPL and Anaconda
item.description: A flexible, project-centered setup for data science Switch between projects with a keystroke and do not worry about switching build systems. Expedite your data science workflow with this project-centered setup. In this tutorial you will learn how to link Sublime Text 3 to an environment from Anaconda/Miniconda and execute Python with Sublime REPL. When you switch the project in Sublime, the build system switches as well to the conda environment associated with it.
